_meta.description: Car Wars tires - base types and modifications with physics engine values
_meta.source: Car Wars Compendium 2nd Edition, Uncle Albert's Catalog
notes: Front tires must match, rear tires must match
HC drops by 1 if front/rear don't match same type
Cycle tires cost same but weigh half as much

physics_values._notes: Physics traction - standardized across all tires to match Car Wars (tires don't affect acceleration)
physics_values.mu: Friction coefficient - SAME for all tire types (2.0). Tire choice affects handling/damage, not accel.
physics_values.tuning_note: mu=2.0 balanced with gear ratios to achieve Car Wars 10 mph/s acceleration
physics_values.future_extension: If adding realistic tire physics later, could add optional mu_override per tire

solid.name: Solid Tire
solid.notes: Half damage from spikes, immune to debris

plasticore.name: Plasticore Tire
plasticore.notes: After 4 DP damage, rubber strips off exposing core. HC drops by 1 when any tire exposed. Cannot be radial or off-road. Cannot be steelbelted.

steelbelted.name: Steelbelted
steelbelted.notes: Increases cost and weight by 50%, DP by 25% (round down)

radial.name: Radial
radial.notes: Must be on all wheels for HC bonus. Applied after steelbelting.

off_road.name: Off-Road (OR)
off_road.notes: Must be on all wheels. No bonus on highway. Cannot combine with radial.

racing_slick.name: Racing Slick
racing_slick.notes: HC +2 if on all wheels, +1 if front or back only. D3 hazard just hitting oil/ice/water. Takes double damage from spikes/debris. 1 DP per 10 min on regular roads.

fireproof.name: Fireproof
fireproof.notes: Doubles cost, applied after all other mods

cycle_tires.notes: Cycle tires cost the same but weigh half as much

spare_tire.notes: Must match vehicle size class. Luxury/Station Wagon share size. Van/Camper/Pickup share size.

car_wheelguard.name: Wheelguard (Car)
car_wheelguard.notes: Protects tire on roll of 1-5. One per tire.

retractable_wheelguard.name: Retractable Wheelguard
retractable_wheelguard.notes: Can be retracted during combat. Costs double normal wheelguard.

tire_chains.name: Tire Chains
tire_chains.notes: Reduces ice hazard by D2, max speed 40 mph when installed
